NetEase revenue up 
2019-08-09
Net revenue of Chinese internet giant NetEase reached 18.77 billion yuan (US$2.73 billion) in the second quarter of 2019, up 15.3 percent year on year, the company said yesterday. The Nasdaq-listed company’s gross profit rose 12.2 percent year on year to 8.13 billion yuan in Q2, according to its unaudited financial results. Net profit attributable to the company’s shareholders was more than 3 billion yuan in the period.
